pageContext.claim: “Only fools, or worse, are saying that our money losing Post Office makes money with Amazon. THEY LOSE A FORTUNE, and this will be changed. Also, our fully tax paying retailers are closing stores all over the country...not a level playing field!”
pageContext.analysis: The Postal Service reported a net loss in 2017, and it does offer Amazon cut rates. But that’s not the whole story. E-commerce deliveries are one of the post office’s few thriving and growing lines of business.
